48.ara-name: كتاب الدعوات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Anas bin Malik narrated that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“Whoever says – that is: when he leaves his house – ‘In the Name of Allah, I place my trust in Allah, there is no might or power except by Allah (Bismillāh, tawakkaltu `alallāh, lā ḥawla wa lā quwwata illā billāh)’ it will be said to him: ‘You have been sufficed and protected,’ and Shaitan will become distant from him.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يَقُولُ إِذَا خَرَجَ مِنْ بَيْتِهِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related Concerning What One Says When Leaving His House
